item.title: Pihole
item.description: Challenge Submit the contents of flag.txt, found in USB storage on the device. Device Location: 192.168.10.172 Ports: 22, 80 Admin interface: https://192.168.10.172/admin Possible Exploit https://frichetten.com/blog/cve-2020-11108-pihole-rce/
